quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
visionDesc: To foster an inclusive and dynamic learning environment where every student is inspired to excel academically, socially, and emotionally.
missionDesc: Our mission is to provide quality education through innovative teaching methods, promoting lifelong learning and responsible citizenship.

aboutUs.facilitiesContent: Our school offers state-of-the-art facilities including modern classrooms, a well-equipped library, science labs, sports fields, and more.
aboutUs.achievementsContent: We are proud of our students' achievements, including academic excellence, sports championships, and cultural accomplishments.
aboutUs.activitiesContent: Our students engage in a variety of extracurricular activities, from arts and music to sports and community service.
aboutUs.informationContent: Located in a serene environment, our school provides a holistic education that prepares students for the future.

academics.title: Academics
academics.description: Our academic programs are designed to challenge and inspire students.

computerLab.title: Computer Lab
computerLab.description: Empowering minds through technology, celebrating innovation and creativity in our digital space!

library.title: Library
library.description: Unleashing the power of knowledge, honoring freedom of thought and expression in our literary haven!

smartboard.title: Smartboard Distribution
smartboard.description: A smartboard is an interactive display that lets users engage with digital content directly, combining the features of a whiteboard with advanced technology.

sportsDay.title: Sports Day
sportsDay.description: A day full of exciting sports and games to encourage physical fitness and teamwork.

independenceDay.title: Independence Day
independenceDay.description: Celebrating the freedom and sovereignty of our nation with various cultural programs.

rakshabandhan.title: Rakshabandhan
rakshabandhan.description: Celebrating the bond of love and protection with Rakhi events and activities.

ecoClub.title: Eco Club
ecoClub.description: Promoting cleanliness and hygiene with a community-driven cleanliness drive.

adivasiDivas.title: Adivasi Divas
adivasiDivas.description: Adivasi Divas honors the rich cultural heritage and contributions of indigenous communities in India.

culturalDay.title: Cultural Day
culturalDay.description: A celebration of cultural diversity and student participation in various performances.

admissionSteps: Visit the school office with the required documents.
Fill out the admission form provided by the school.
Submit the form and documents to the office.
Wait for the confirmation from the school administration.
eligibilitySteps: Students must be within the age range specified for each grade.
Required documents include birth certificate, previous school records, etc.
Parents/guardians must provide proof of residence.
Any other criteria set by the government or school administration.
